name: Paint Strike 3d
description:
Drag and Drop to Shoot & Paint all the Objects!

Paint Strike is a one-hand addictive 3D Shooting popular Game with an infinity of levels to complete new trending !

Paint Strike 3D Game is engaging to play and tough to master it just effects by voodoo to move forward.

Avoid red glow spiral tower in middle and jump trouble.

A Happy Game to play in new 2019.
